name: happy-dom-cjs
author: David Ortner
description: Happy DOM is a JavaScript implementation of a web browser without its graphical user interface. It includes many web standards from WHATWG DOM and HTML.

scripts.compile: npm run compile:copy-src && tsc && npm run compile:build-version-file
scripts.compile:copy-src: node -e "fs.rmSync('./src', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.cpSync('../happy-dom/src', './src', { recursive: true, force: true });"
